snippet: The Justice Department sued the online retailer eBay, saying it had entered into an anticompetitive agreement with Intuit that prohibited them from hiring each other’s employees.
abstract: Justice Department sues eBay, saying it entered into an anticompetitive agreement with Intuit that prohibited them from hiring each other's employees.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department sued the online retailer eBay, saying it had entered into an anticompetitive agreement with Intuit that prohibited them from hiring each other’s employees.

headline.main: EBay and Intuit Named in Federal Antitrust Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: EBay And Intuit Named In Federal Antitrust Lawsuit
